Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャ
Entry.EnglishText: Misha

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: どうもー♪
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks! ♪

Entry.JapaneseText: ご苦労。 まじめに働けよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Good work. Don't go slacking off.

Entry.JapaneseText: はーい。
Entry.EnglishText: We won't!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これからどうすれば……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, what do we do now?

Entry.JapaneseText: トミッチのところに 行ってみる？
Entry.EnglishText: Should we try Tomich's boat?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、海上を封鎖されているのでは どちらにしろ船は出せないだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: No, regardless of his offer, if the port is closed then we wouldn't be able to set sail.

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん……誰かこの街で 頼りにできる人はいないかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... Isn't there anyone in this town we can ask for help?

Entry.JapaneseText: 昨日、ここでのもめごとを止めた、 ヒューマの娘に覚えはないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you remember seeing a Huma girl who stopped a fight yesterday?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマが外に出ていいのかよ。
Entry.EnglishText: They're letting the Huma outside?
Entry.Notes: English is a question while the JP isnt.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聞いているのはオレだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm the one asking questions here!

Entry.JapaneseText: そ、そんなヤツがいたなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: O-okay, yeah, I saw her...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……その娘はどこへ行った!? その後、街で見かけなかったか？
Entry.EnglishText: Where did she go? Have you seen her around town since that incident?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの娘なんて どこにだっているし、 見分けなんてつかねえよ。
Entry.EnglishText: As if I'm going to remember the face of every Huma girl I see walking around!

Entry.JapaneseText: とってもキレイな人なんだヨ！ ひと目見たら、きっと忘れないと 思うんだけどなぁ？
Entry.EnglishText: She's really pretty! I'm pretty sure even one look at her is enough to remember her by!

Entry.JapaneseText: キレイなヒューマだぁ？
Entry.EnglishText: A pretty Huma, eh?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのべっぴんさんなら 忘れねえんだがな。 そっちのお嬢さんみたいに。
Entry.EnglishText: Now if she were a Gajuma beauty, I'm sure I'd remember. Especially if she looked like that girl over there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……くっ！
Entry.EnglishText: Tch!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>…… どこへ行ったんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>... Where the hell are you?!

Entry.JapaneseText: キレイなヒューマの女って 言われてもなあ…… あんたはどうなんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: You said she was a pretty Huma... What about you?

Entry.JapaneseText: キレイなヒューマの女って 言われてもピンとこねえなあ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not recalling any pretty Huma girls...

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼうずたち、また来たのか？ まだ港は閉鎖されたままだ。 船は出ないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: You guys again? The port is still closed. No ships are leaving.

Entry.JapaneseText: ううん、今回は 仕事で来たんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, this time we're here on official business.

Entry.JapaneseText: 仕事？
Entry.EnglishText: Business?

Entry.JapaneseText: 定期便が再開されるまで、 この街で働く事にしたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: We decided to find work here until the ships are back to their regular schedule.

Entry.JapaneseText: うんうん、それがいい。
Entry.EnglishText: Well now, that's good of you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒場の主人からの届け物だ。 船に積み込みたいんだが 通してもらえないか？
Entry.EnglishText: The bar owner wants this box delivered. We'd like to load it onto the ship, so would you mind letting us pass?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、もちろんだ。 ホラ、がんばって仕事してくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, of course! Keep up the good work, guys.

Entry.JapaneseText: この港は、カレギア軍の 管理下にある。
Entry.EnglishText: This port is under control of the Callegean military.

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカに渡りたいなら、 出直して来い。
Entry.EnglishText: If you want to cross over to Balka, you'll have to come back later.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本港は閉鎖中だ。 民間人の船の乗降は 禁止されている。
Entry.EnglishText: The main port is closed. Civilians are not allowed to embark or disembark on any ships at this time.

Entry.JapaneseText: しっかり働けよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Keep working hard.

Entry.JapaneseText: 母親が見つかるといいな、 ボウズ。
Entry.EnglishText: I hope you find your mother, young man.

Entry.JapaneseText: 兄貴なら、弟をしっかり 守ってやれよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Make sure you keep your younger brother safe.

Entry.JapaneseText: 船には乗れんと 言ったら、乗れんのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: If I say you can't ride a ship, then you can't ride a ship, no questions asked.

Entry.JapaneseText: ご主人様を連れて、 さっさと行った、行った。
Entry.EnglishText: Get your masters out of here quickly.

Entry.JapaneseText: この港は閉鎖中だ。 海を渡りたかったら、 他の港へ回ったらどうだ？
Entry.EnglishText: This port is closed. If you want to cross the ocean, why don't you go around to some other port?

Entry.JapaneseText: お願いします!! 話し合いましょうよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone, please! You need to talk things out!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとかヒューマとか、 そんな事でケンカしても 意味ありませんっ！
Entry.EnglishText: There's no point in fighting because you're of different races!

Entry.JapaneseText: 黙れ、ガジュマ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Shut up, Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 子供は引っ込んでろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Kids need to stay out of this!

Entry.JapaneseText: 引っ込みません!! やめてください!!
Entry.EnglishText: I can't ignore this! Please, stop this nonsense!

Entry.JapaneseText: あっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Ah!

Entry.JapaneseText: 大丈夫？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアさん!? ぼくなら大丈夫です！
Entry.EnglishText: Claire?! ...Yes, I'm fine!

Entry.JapaneseText: ケッ、ガジュマのくせに でしゃばるから 痛い目にあうんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Tch, that's what a Gajuma like you gets for butting into things that don't concern you!

Entry.JapaneseText: 子供をあんな目にあわせて、 よくもそんな事が言えますね！
Entry.EnglishText: A person who does harm to a mere child has some nerve to speak that way!

Entry.JapaneseText: ははっ、ヒューマがヒューマに 叱られてやがるぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hah! You Huma will even tell each other off!

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたも同じでしょう！ 子供にケンカを止められて 恥ずかしくないのですか!?
Entry.EnglishText: As if you are any different! Are you not embarrassed that you have to be told to stop fighting by a child?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そ、それは……
Entry.EnglishText: W-well, I...

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族の事を言う前に自分の行いが ひとりの<Yellow>ヒト<White>として正しいか、 よく考えてごらんなさい!!
Entry.EnglishText: Before even thinking about race, you should consider whether your own actions are befitting of a <Yellow>Human<White> being!

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ここから先は 進入禁止だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Halt. Access to the harbor is strictly prohibited.

Entry.JapaneseText: 現在、軍関係の船舶以外は バルカとの往来を停止している。 残念だが、おまえたちの 乗る船はない。
Entry.EnglishText: Transportation to and from Balka is currently suspended for all non- military purposes. We apologize for any inconvenience, but there are no ships available at this time.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなぁ！ ボクたち、 バルカ行きの定期船に乗るために はるばるスールズから来たんだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: What!? But we came all the way from Sulz just so that we could take one to Balka!

Entry.JapaneseText: なぜ船が止まっているんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Why has ship travel been halted?

Entry.JapaneseText: おかみの考える事は オレたちにはわからんよ。 命令されただけなんだからな。
Entry.EnglishText: We have no idea what the higher ups are thinking. We're just following orders.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつになれば、船は動く？
Entry.EnglishText: When will it start up again?

Entry.JapaneseText: さあな。今日かもしれんし 明日かもしれん…… 来年って事だってある。
Entry.EnglishText: Who knows? Could be today, could be tomorrow... Could even be next year.

Entry.JapaneseText: くっ…… サレの命令か……！
Entry.EnglishText: Tch... This must be Saleh's doing!

Entry.JapaneseText: いや…… 彼ら正規軍は<Blue>王の盾<White>とは別だ。 サレに王国の正規軍を動かす 権限はないはずだが……
Entry.EnglishText: No... The Callegean Army is separate from the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>. Saleh shouldn't have any authority over them.

Entry.JapaneseText: でもヘンじゃない？ 正規軍がこんな大々的に 動くなんて、普通じゃないヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: That's still pretty weird, right? It isn't normal for the regular army to do something as drastic as this.

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに……軍が港を封鎖して 首都との船の往来を禁じるとは…… バルカで何かあったか。 いや、これから何かあるのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed. For the army to shut down the harbor and prohibit maritime travel to the capital... I wonder if something happened in Balka. Or, is this in preparation for something?

Entry.JapaneseText: だとすれば、やっぱり<Blue>王の盾<White>は バルカに向かったのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: If that's the case, then is the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> even going to Balka?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……クレアの事も、 その事と関係があるのか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...And what does kidnapping Claire have to do with any of this?

Entry.JapaneseText: わからん…… ともかく、今は海を渡って バルカに入らない事には……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know... At any rate, it looks like there's no travelling to Balka by sea...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ねえ、おじさん、 カレギア軍の船に乗せてよ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Hey mister, can we board a Callegean Army ship?

Entry.JapaneseText: ダメに決まってるだろ。 ほら、帰った帰った！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't be ridiculous. Now go on, get lost!

Entry.JapaneseText: ひとつだけ聞かせてくれ。 最後に船が出たのはいつだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Let me ask you one thing. When was the last time a ship left port?

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん、確か…… 一週間ぐらい前だったかな。
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... If memory serves me right, about a week ago.

Entry.JapaneseText: それはカレギア軍の船か？ その船に、ヒューマの娘たちが 乗ってなかったか？
Entry.EnglishText: Was it a Callegean Army vessel? And was there a group of Huma girls on board?

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、どうだったかなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, beats me...

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの軍人が、 そんないい加減でどうする！
Entry.EnglishText: How can a man as careless as you call himself a soldier of Callegea!?

Entry.JapaneseText: し、失礼しましたッ!! ……えっ？
Entry.EnglishText: I-I'm sorry, sir!! ...Huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ、おまえ！ 上官みたいな口をききやがって。 思わず謝っちまったじゃないか！
Entry.EnglishText: What the hell! Ordering me around like you're my superior! You\made me apologize for nothing!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……すまない。
Entry.EnglishText: ...My apologies.

Entry.JapaneseText: よく見ると、怪しいヤツらだな。 おまえら、バルカに何しに 行くんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Come to think of it, you guys seem pretty suspicious. What business do you have in Balka?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……怪しくなんかないよ。 ボクと兄さんは、生き別れになった ママを探しに行くところなんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: W-We're not suspicious, sir! Me and my big brother here are... looking for our long lost mother!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そっちのガジュマの男は？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Then who is this Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクの召使いだよ。 子供だけの旅は危険だし、 用心棒代わりなんだ……ネ？
Entry.EnglishText: He's our butler! It's dangerous for kids to travel by themselves, so he's acting as our bodyguard... right?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、ああ……いや、はい。
Entry.EnglishText: Uh? R-Right... I mean, yes, Master.

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん、まあいい…… とりあえずおまえたちを 軍の船に乗せるわけにはいかん。
Entry.EnglishText: Huh, well if you say so... At any rate, there's still no way I can allow you to board an army vessel.

Entry.JapaneseText: ええー、そんなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Aww, give us a break...

Entry.JapaneseText: やむをえない…… ……いや、やむをえませんね。 坊ちゃん、行きましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: Guess we're done here... I-I mean, I suppose there is nothing more we can do. Young Master, let us be going now.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……残念だけど…… おじさん、ムリ言ってゴメンなさい。 お兄ちゃんも行こ。
Entry.EnglishText: I see... That's too bad. Mister, sorry for bothering you. C'mon big bro, let's go.

Entry.JapaneseText: 逃げるわけにはいかないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't run away from this...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
